text: Sándor Nagy is a Hungarian former ice dancer. With Gabriella Remport, he is a two-time Hungarian national champion. The duo competed at three World Championships and four European Championships. They were coached by Ilona Berecz. Nagy works as a skating coach in Budapest. His former students include ice dance couples Zsuzsanna Nagy and György Elek, Emese László and Máté Fejes, and Krisztina Barta and Ádám Tóth. Nagy married his ice dance partner Gabriella Remport.
